name: OCKContactControllerProtocol
desc: An object that tracks and updates the state of a contact.

items.name: var objectWillChange: CurrentValueSubject<OCKAnyContact?, Never>
items.desc: A publisher that publishes when contacts change in the store.

items.name: var store: OCKAnyContactStore
items.desc: A reference to the store that fetches and updates events.

items.name: func initiateAddressLookup(completion: (Result<MKMapItem, Error>) -> Void)
items.desc: Initiates showing the address of the contact.

items.name: func initiateCall() -> URL
items.desc: Initiates a call to the contact.

items.name: func initiateEmail() -> MFMailComposeViewController
items.desc: Initiates an email to the contact.

items.name: func initiateMessage() -> MFMessageComposeViewController
items.desc: Initiates sending a message to the contact.

items.name: func initiateSystemContactLookup() -> CNContactViewController
items.desc: Initiates looking up the contact in the system contacts.
